list.description:
Graphical interface for creating custom sights for all tanks for simulator, realistic and arcade battles.

Earlier I made a post https://live.warthunder.com/post/1034369/ on a similar topic, but now I have made a full-fledged window interface for customizing sights.
You have a choice of an executable exe file and original python project (read Installation).
Gaijin does not allow loading the exe into the zip attached to the post, so there is a copy of the project in python.

Updated 18.12
- New vehicles up to War Thunder 2.53
- New sights location support
- Optional...

[DDLC] Monika Sight

"Fire!" (“开炮!”）
Bring Monika into War Thunder reality - and fire with her telling you the range measurement. One step closer to our reality...

Installation: Unzip/extract the files, copy all the .blk files inside the all_tanks folder which is inside the unzipped folder, then paste them inside your Warthunder folder in WarThunder > UserSights > all_tanks .

4 variations for the sight (3 different sizes) are included, check sightinfo.txt for clarification on the naming. The Sketchup file is also included in case you want to edit the sight...

This is a KV-220 sight that includes a little drawing in the bottom left corner showcasing the optimal angle you should take when facing an opponent. The original SketchUp files are included for you to tweak anything you want.

If you want to learn how to edit this drawing/make your own, visit this link!!
https://live.warthunder.com/post/1000444/en/

#sim #simulator #sb #kv220 #сб #симулятор #сим

"DUGA" SIGHT PACKAGE

Project development is being continued by a different person. To get most actual version go to:

https://discord.gg/umdGKBweRs
OR
https://github.com/tsvl/WT-FCSGenerator

Last update 17.10.2025
- Added the tanks of the latest updates.

This sight allows you to measure the distance to the target using arcs set to the length and width of a notional tank.
...

Self-updated sights based on https://live.warthunder.com/user/TopTblga/ and their FEROZ18 bundles. These are exclusively for top-tier tanks with their best shells that I own and play with.

Copy these folders into SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder\UserSights or copy the UserSights folder into SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\War Thunder.

The list of vehicles included are: ZLT11, ZTZ96P, AMX40, All Leclerc Variants, Leo 2a5 and a6, Puma IFV, TAM 2C, Merkava MK2D, All Ariete Variants excluding the Ariete P, Centauro 120, Dardo VCC, Both VCC 80s, Both Type 10s, Type 16, CV 90 120, all 9...

Custom sight inspired by the one in Enlisted

It is very similar with the default sight, only difference is shift the left parameters to the middle, better for some shells with low velocity.

The sight are already setup to be use across all tanks, include light/medium/heavy/SPG/SPAA. Just put the all_tanks folder into your UserSights folder, the sights will appears in all of your tanks' custom sight option. But some ATGM carrier like default will still hide the range.

This is an addon not a replacement, you have to manually enable it with each one of your tanks</blo...

Custom sight for the German Schützenpanzer PUMA 30mm autocannon

...

Custom tank sight inspired by the one in the Battlefield 2042

...

Very simple sight usable with all tanks, but primarily for APFSDS and APDS rounds. I got tired of not seeing my target and it's weakspots because of the sight lines while using the rangefinder or aiming above the target, so I offset them. Works with rangefinder. And just for convenience, I set the distance markers to 500 meters, with every thousand written out.

Install: navigate to your main WT install directory and place the .blk file into your UserSights -> all_tanks folder. Create them if you don't have them already.

#apfsds #apds #longrange #simple #clear #line #offset #sniper #range...

当前版本：2.25.0.9 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.

Current version: 2.25.0.9 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.com ...

At the request of: BEPTOLETOBA_COLb made twins from Atomic Heart
I'm sorry that it didn't work out in detail

Installation:
1) Unpack the downloaded file
2) Upload the file to the \War Thunder\UserSights\all_tanks folder

#Atomicheart #AtomicHeart #alltanks #all_tanks #alltank #sight #allsight #USSR #ussr #ussr_tank #ussr_tanks #twins

Setting the sight:

1) Unzip the file to the game folder.
2) Start the game.
3) Go to Settings > Basic > Tank Combat Settings > Sight Settings. Select the desired scope from the list.
Sights marked "Num" have numbers from 4 to 28 on the range correction scale, with "Range" - the old rangefinder.
4) Set the middle text in the parameters of the reticle, this is the best option.
5) Optionally, you can add the field of view, type of projectile, etc.

Thank you for choosing this sight :З Successful fights!

Custom user sight for the Merkava series, created as faithfully as possible from videos of real life Merkavas. Two variants, "early" and "late" for all Merkavas in the game as of update 2.23 "Apex Predators". "early" features three variants for the illuminated colour, orange, green and white. "late" features two colour variants, green and white.

List of Vehicles:

  • USA Merkava Mk.1
  • USA Merkava Mk.2B<...

A grid sight meant to figure out calibration data, such as parallax error.
The large, medium and small squares have edges 10, 5 and 1 thousandths long respectively.

Edit: this sight was made for my Steam guides submission about custom sights.

#calibration

A requested sight of Venti from Genshin Impact

There's a colored and default version. Colored is marked with an (_C)

[DDLC] Chibi Monika (Universal Sight)

Monika in chibi form! She will help ease your suffering and give you better accuracy.

Installation: Extract files to new folder (1), Copy all_tanks folder (2), paste in UserSights folder.

5 variations of the sight included, including different sizes. SketchUp files included.
This took at least 20 hours to make (multiple skill issues).
More monika posting planned!

Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/DDLC/comments/92kre5/updated_hd_monika_chibi_remade_for_reasons/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3
